item.title: All Pokemon GO Level Requirements and Rewards
item.description:
In October of 2025, almost half a decade on since the previous increase, the Pokemon GO level cap was raised from 50 to 80, introducing new rewards and level-up requirements to the popular mobile game. The update also made some changes to the way that existing levels were structured, with the hope being that by rebalancing the existing levels, players will earn levels and rewards more frequently.

Whether you're a brand-new player or a series veteran looking to make that final push toward greatness, the following guide will help you to understand exactly what's needed to get to level 80 in Pokemon GO and the rewards that you can expect for doing so. You can also find out when certain items become available, with item unlocks and cosmetic rewards formatted in bold.

All Pokemon GO Level Requirements and Rewards (Level 1 - Level 80)

Level

Tasks / XP Requirement

Rewards / Unlocks

1

  • Unlocked by Default

  • N/A

2

  • Earn 2,500 XP (2,500 Total)

  • Poke Ball (x10)
  • Nanab Berry (x5)

3

  • Poke Ball (x10)
  • Nanab Berry (x5)

item.title: Best Games Where You Can Be An Evil Ruler
item.description:
Power fantasies in games often cast players as noble leaders or saviors. Yet some of the most compelling experiences explore the darker side of authority, where cruelty, manipulation, and absolute control define the journey, allowing players to embrace villainy not as a narrative twist, but as the core part of the gameplay.

Whether through tyranny, corruption, or domination, many games offer unique ways to rule with malice, revealing how open-ended systems and moral choices can transform leadership into an exploration of power’s destructive potential. By granting freedom to govern without restraint, these games let players embody the ultimate dark fantasy of becoming an evil ruler who never holds back.

Total War: Warhammer III

Commanding Armies In The Name Of Darkness

Total War: Warhammer 3
8.3 /10
Released
February 17, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
t
Developer(s)
Creative Assembly
Platform(s)
PC
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Total War: Warhammer III gives players the chance to rule as some of fantasy’s most infamous factions, from the demonic hosts of Chaos to tyrannical undead legions. Each faction is built on domination, corruption, and conquest, making villainy not just an option but the central theme.

The game really rewards cruelty and aggression in terms of strategic decision-making, while the battlefield offers countless ways to crush opposition until there's nothing left. By embracing dark powers, players can quickly spread corruption across the entire map, transforming empires through sheer unrelenting evil.

Tropico 6

Ruling With Authority And Oppression

Tropico 6
Simulation
Systems
Released
March 29, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
Teen // Drug Reference, Mild Language, Violence
Developer(s)
Limbic Entertainment
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PC
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Tropico 6 allows players to don the persona of “El Presidente,” a ruler whose methods can lean toward benevolence or authoritarian control. Choosing the latter transforms governance into a dictatorship, where citizens become tools for the player to use and control to meet their evil ends.

Maintaining power requires surveillance, propaganda, and occasionally crushing dissent. While players may cloak tyranny in charm, ruling as an evil despot provides endless opportunities to exploit citizens, and the game gives players all the power to rule with as much might and fury as they could ever want.

Crusader Kings 3

Bloodlines Become Ruthless Dynasties

Crusader Kings 3
12
8.7 /10
Released
September 1, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teens: Drug Reference, Language, Mild Violence, Suggestive Themes
Developer(s)
Paradox Interactive
Platform(s)
PS5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, PC
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

In Crusader Kings III, players lead medieval dynasties, but they are under no obligation to rule righteously. Leadership can take on a variety of forms, with the evil route being both a viable and rewarding path that leads players into arcs of betrayal, assassination, blackmail, and more.

The open-ended systems can often reward cunning over compassion. Through manipulation and cruelty, players can craft legacies defined by fear, demonstrating that in grand strategy, evil is not just permissible but sometimes the most effective route to dominance.

Evil Genius 2: World Domination

Building An Empire Of Villiany

Evil Genius 2: World Domination
Strategy
Simulation
Systems
Released
March 30, 2021

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen // Fantasy Violence, Mild Language
Developer(s)
Rebellion Developments
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Evil Genius 2 places players in the role of a cartoonish supervillain bent on world domination. From a secret island lair, every decision reinforces the fantasy of ruling through fear, manipulation, and ruthless efficiency, with henchmen carrying out devious orders, while elaborate traps keep intruders at bay.

The core loop thrives on experimentation with tyranny. Expanding the lair, managing minions, and orchestrating global schemes all reinforce the image of an evil ruler commanding absolute power. It is a modern strategy experience that embraces villainy without apology, turning domination into both art and science.

Stellaris

Domination On A Galactic Scale

Stellaris
8 /10
8.6 /10
Released
May 9, 2016

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
E10+ For Everyone 10+ due to Violent References, Mild Language
Developer(s)
Paradox Development Studio
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

In Stellaris , players craft entire empires across planets, shaping ideologies and policies that define galactic presence. Embracing authoritarian or xenophobic paths transforms governance into interstellar tyranny, and the evil approach can lead to oppression, slavery, and purges, all in the name of progress.

Experimentation with ruling styles highlights how cruelty can reshape entire civilizations. The game rewards harsh policies with unique advantages, making tyranny not only thematic but mechanically potent, and it gives players an alternative path to follow that can lead to larger acts of conquest than ever before.

Frostpunk

Authority As Cold As The Setting

Frostpunk
8.0 /10
Released
April 24, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood, Mild Sexual Themes, Mild Violence, Strong Language
Developer(s)
11 Bit Studios
Platform(s)
PC, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Frostpunk challenges players to lead a frozen city where survival demands harsh governance. Laws can enforce child labor, brutal punishments, or totalitarian rule, and choosing cruelty ensures order but erodes humanity, creating an interesting balance that players can tip in either direction.

The moral weight of decisions defines the experience. Evil rulership is not just permitted but often practical, making tyranny an attractive path to survival. It highlights how authoritarian power can thrive in desperation and how, when faced with tough decisions, sometimes evil is inevitable.

Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord

Becoming The Ultimate Warlord

Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord
8.0 /10
Released
October 25, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

M For Mature 17+ due to Blood, Violence
Developer(s)
TaleWorlds Entertainment
Platform(s)
PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

In Bannerlord , players rise from mercenary to monarch, shaping kingdoms through conquest and diplomacy. Embracing ruthless strategies turns leadership into tyranny, with villages razed, rivals executed, and subjects ruled by fear.

The sandbox design makes villainy a natural expression of power. Experimentation with cruelty provides tangible rewards, cementing the role of evil ruler as a legitimate path to dominance in a way that few open-world games have been able to replicate.

item.title: Manekin Team Composition Guide In Genshin Impact
item.description:
One of the craziest things to ever happen to Genshin Impact is allowing a customizable character like Manekin to roam the open world of Teyvat. That makes them a viable option to explore the map, or even use them to fight open world bosses. However, it's complicated to choose the right teams for them, as they can manipulate all elements and may have an underwhelming performance in some of them. Here are the best teams for Manekin in Genshin Impact , including the best teams for each element.

Anemo Manekin Best Teams In Genshin Impact

Anemo characters that depend on their Normal attacks are always good at operating as drivers for other off-field elements. Having Electro, Hydro, and Pyro behind the Anemo Manekin allows them to Swirl all these elements into creating endless streaks of elemental reactions, such as Electro-charged, Vaporize, and Overloaded. Even if the off-field characters don't have attacks that follow up with Anemo Manekin's Normal attacks, they're still dealing a lot of Anemo DMG, triggering Swirls that will keep mixing the elements.

Team Examples

  • Anemo Manekin F2P team: Anemo Manekin + Fischl + Xingqiu + Xiangling
  • Anemo Manekin Premium team: Anemo Manekin + Ineffa + Aino + Xilonen

Geo Manekin Best Teams In Genshin Impact

Geo Manekin struggles to operate as a main DPS unless you build them with some premium Swords like Summit Shaper or Uraku Misugiri. You also need to invest in strong buffers like Zhongli and Furina to make sure Geo Manekin has the best DPS potential they can achieve.

Since using Manekin in the first place is just for fun, you can try a Shatter team with Geo Manekin in Genshin Impact . Match Geo Manekin with two Cryo and Hydro enablers to spam the Frozen and Shatter reactions. For the last spot, either add Zhongli since he reduces Physical resistance by 20%, or add an Electro character like Fischl or Kuki to trigger the Superconduct reaction and shred enemies' Physical resistance by 40%. Make sure to switch the Geo Manekin's build to a full Elemental Mastery build while building the rest of the team with artifacts and weapons that boost the Manekin's Elemental Mastery.

Team Examples

  • Geo Manekin F2P team: Geo Manekin + Xingqiu + Gorou + Yun Jin
  • Geo Manekin Premium team: Geo Manekin + Zhongli + Furina + Bennett
  • Geo Manekin F2P Shatter team: Geo Manekin + C6 Diona + Aino + Fischl

Electro Manekin Best Teams In Genshin Impact

Electro Manekin excels at transforming Dendro Cores into Hyperbloom reactions since they will stay on the field, dealing consistent Electro DMG. You need strong off-field Dendro and Hydro characters that keep triggering Bloom reactions to keep feeding Electro Manekin's attacks. It's an easy-to-build team since all you need is to spam Elemental Mastery on Electro Manekin while having access to a lot of F2P and 5-star options in Genshin Impact .

Team Examples

  • Electro Manekin F2P team: Electro Manekin + Collei + Xingqiu + Yaoyao
  • Electro Manekin Premium team: Electro Manekin + Nahida + C6 Aino + Lauma

Dendro Manekin Best Teams In Genshin Impact

Dendro Manekin can drive Dendro to feed all the Hyperbloom and Burgeon reactions in Genshin Impact . They can also be part of Nilou's Bloom teams as they have an acceptable Dendro application when they're on the field. Basically, since Dendro reactions strongly synergize with the Hydro, Pyro, and Electro elements, Dendro Manekin can work with any character that can apply them off-field.

Team Examples

  • Dendro Manekin F2P team: Dendro Manekin + Xingqiu + Collei + Kuki
  • Dendro Manekin Premium team: Dendro Manekin + C6 Aino + Nahida + Ineffa
  • Dendro Burgeon Manekin team: Dendro Manekin + Xingqiu + Nahida + Xiangling
  • Dendro Bloom Manekin team: Dendro Manekin + Nilou + Nahida + Kokomi

Hydro Manekin Best Teams In Genshin Impact

Just like Dendro, Hydro characters can work with a lot of other characters because of how strong Hydro is with the other elements. Matching Hydro with Electro, Pyro, Dendro, and Cryo creates a lot of strong reactions. You can put Hydro Manekin in Freeze, Hyperbloom, Burgeon, and Bloom teams. You can even include them in some classic teams that mash different elements together, like the International and National teams in Genshin impact .

Team Examples

  • Hydro Manekin F2P team: Hydro Manekin + Sucrose + Fischl + Xiangling
  • Hydro Manekin Premium team: Hydro Manekin + Ineffa + C6 Aino + Lauma
  • Hydro Manekin Freeze team: Hydro Manekin + Citlali + Xilonen + Furina
  • Hydro Manekin Burgeon team: Hydro Manekin + Lauma + Nahida + Thoma
  • Hydro Manekin Bloom team: Hydro Manekin + Lauma + Baizhu + Nilou

Pyro Manekin Best Teams In Genshin Impact

You can build a team around Pyro Manekin's Elemental Burst in Genshin Impact . The idea is to set the field with characters like Furina, Xilonen, and Citlali, applying Hydro or Cryo to all enemies with crazy buffs. Get Pyro Manekin on the field and unleash a devastating Elemental Burst that will probably deal around 200k DMG (unfortunately, the Manekin doesn't have a high DMG ceiling). After that, cast Pyro Manekin's Elemental Skill and deal DMG with their Normal attacks while all the buffs are still working. It's a decent team for Pyro Manekin, but only if you have the characters.

With less investment, you can build a Pyro Manekin Burgeon team in Genshin Impact . All you need are characters that are good at creating Dendro Cores, like Nahida, Xingqiu, Lauma, and Baizhu.

Team Examples

  • Pyro Manekin F2P team: Pyro Manekin + Collei + Xingqiu + Yaoyao
  • Pyro Manekin Premium team: Pyro Manekin + Lauma + Baizhu + Yelan
  • Pyro Manekin Burst team: Pyro Manekin + Furina + Citlali + Xilonen

item.title: EA Takes Down Popular Call of Duty Map From Battlefield 6 Portal
item.description:
A player recently remade Call of Duty ’s “Shipment” map using Battlefield 6 ’s Portal mode, but the creation was quickly removed for breaking the Community Guidelines. This showcases how eager Electronic Arts is to crack down on gamers creating “inappropriate” content for Battlefield 6 .

Battlefield 6 was released on October 10, offering a variety of game modes for fans. Apart from having a single-player campaign and regular multiplayer modes, the popular FPS offers players the opportunity to customize their own games via Battlefield 6 ’s Portal mode. In this mode, anyone can create their own maps, weapons, and even rules, and compete with friends.

Electronic Arts Removes Popular 'Shipment 2019 Edition' Map From Battlefield 6 Portal

Unfortunately, one of the most popular maps from Portal mode has recently been taken down by EA. The “Shipment 2019 edition” map was removed from Battlefield 6 due to breaking the rules, which forbid players from making “inappropriate references to third-party products.” First introduced in Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare and reappearing in several entries of the franchise later, “Shipment” is a popular Call of Duty multiplayer map that stands out due to its small size, allowing for action-packed matches.

“Shipment” is far from the only map that received a fair share of attention from the community, though. Gamers have already devised some fairly interesting Battlefield 6 maps in Portal mode, ranging from close-quarters arenas to sprawling areas. Among the most popular maps so far, there is "Besieged," for example, which offers a wave-defense horde mode. Fans who wanted to efficiently farm XP from bots have also made "Breakthrough Solo Bots" a popular - if controversial - map.

A fan has also recreated Battlefield 3 ’s Noshahr Canals map in Battlefield 6 . According to the map’s creator, this was a difficult task to pull off, as the assets are still fairly limited in Portal mode, but the final result offers a fairly nostalgic experience.

Gamers can expect Portal mode to become even bigger with time, especially as the developers add more functions to it, and the creators in the community get used to its quirks. Battlefield 6 had a huge launch, with over 700,000 simultaneous Steam players trying it soon after the release. A few days ago, Electronic Arts revealed that Battlefield 6 sold over six million units in the first three days. With these numbers, not only is Battlefield 6 a serious competitor to this year’s Call of Duty , even without gamers copying its maps, but it also has a fairly good chance to be supported by EA for a long time.

22
8.6 /10
9 /10

item.title: How To Build Manekin In Genshin Impact (Best Weapons And Artifacts)
item.description:
The Miliastra Wonderland Manekin is a playable and customizable character in Genshin Impact . You obtain the Manekin by unlocking the Miliastra Wonderland, and it can also be played in the open world. It's an interesting character that can wield all the elements, but has the same movesets on every one of them. Here are the best builds for Manekin in Genshin Impact , including the best artifacts and weapons for each element.

How To Switch Manekin Element In Genshin Impact

To switch the Manekin's element in Genshin Impact , simply switch the Traveler's element by heading to the Statue of the Seven of the element's respective region. Once the protagonist changes its alignment, the Manekin will automatically switch their element as well.

Anemo Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

Anemo Manekin works as a driver for other elements like Hydro, Pyro, and Electro in Genshin Impact . For that, it's good to build them with artifact sets like Viridescent Venerer (VV), which will shred enemies' resistance to those elements. It's good to have both Elemental Mastery and ATK% on Anemo Manekin since their role will be to drive elements and trigger reactions while dealing a lot of Anemo DPS.

Weapons

  1. Mistsplitter Reforged
  2. Haran Geppaku Futsu
  3. Primordial Jade Cutter
  4. Skyward Blade
  5. Lion's Roar
  6. Iron Sting

Artifact Sets

  • 4pc Viridescent Venerer
  • 4pc Desert Pavilion Chronicle

Stats

  • Timepiece: Elemental Mastery or ATK%
  • Goblet: Elemental Mastery or ATK%
  • Circlet: Crit DMG or Crit Rate

Substats

  1. Crit DMG
  2. Crit Rate
  3. ATK%
  4. Elemental Mastery
  5. Energy Recharge

Geo Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

There's not much use for a Geo Manekin since they barely have any useful elemental reaction in Genshin Impact . However, it's worth noting that Uraku Misugiri and the Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods set notably increase the DPS of Geo Manekin, giving them a little value in combat instead of nothing at all.

Weapons

  1. Uraku Misugiri
  2. Summit Shaper
  3. Mistsplitter Reforged
  4. Haran Geppaku Futsu
  5. Primordial Jade Cutter
  6. Skyward Blade
  7. Lion's Roar

Artifact Sets

  • 4pc Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods
  • 4pc Shimenawa's Reminiscence

Stats

  • Timepiece: ATK%
  • Goblet: Geo DMG
  • Circlet: Crit Rate or Crit DMG

Substats

  1. Crit DMG
  2. Crit Rate
  3. ATK%
  4. Energy Recharge

Electro Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

As a cheat code for any Electro character that fails to deal any kind of DPS, Hyperbloom teams are always the answer. Slap as much Elemental Mastery as possible and build Electro Manekin with the Flower of Paradise Lost set to maximize the DMG of their Hyperbloom.

Weapons

  1. Light of Foliar Incision
  2. Freedom-Sworn
  3. Xiphos' Moonlight
  4. Sapwood Blade
  5. Iron Sting

Artifact Sets

  • 4pc Flower of Paradise Lost
  • 4pc Gilded Dreams
  • 4pc Thundering Fury

Stats

  • Timepiece: Elemental Mastery
  • Goblet: Elemental Mastery
  • Circlet: Elemental Mastery or Crit Rate

Substats

  1. Elemental Mastery
  2. Crit Rate
  3. Crit DMG
  4. Energy Recharge

Dendro Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

Dendro Manekin can operate as a driver for Nilou teams since they have a decent Dendro application when they're on the field. The Dendro Cores' DMG scale with Elemental Mastery, so build Dendro Manekin on a lot of that stat in Genshin Impact .

Weapons

  1. Light of Foliar Incision
  2. Freedom-Sworn
  3. Xiphos' Moonlight
  4. Sapwood Blade
  5. Iron Sting

Artifact Sets

  • 4pc Flower of Paradise Lost
  • 4pc Gilded Dreams
  • 4pc Deepwood Memories

Stats

  • Timepiece: Elemental Mastery
  • Goblet: Elemental Mastery
  • Circlet: Elemental Mastery or Crit Rate

Substats

  1. Elemental Mastery
  2. Crit Rate
  3. Crit DMG
  4. Energy Recharge

Hydro Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

Although Hydro is one of the best elements in Genshin Impact , it still fails to save Manekin's DPS. It's better to run Hydro Manekin in Vaporize teams with a full DPS build to make the most of their time on the field. They can also operate as a driver for Ineffa teams in Genshin Impact .

Weapons

  1. Mistsplitter Reforged
  2. Haran Geppaku Futsu
  3. Primordial Jade Cutter
  4. Wolf-Fang
  5. The Black Sword
  6. Skyward Blade
  7. Lion's Roar

Artifact Sets

  • 4pc Heart of Depth
  • 4pc Nymph's Dream

Stats

  • Timepiece: ATK%
  • Goblet: Hydro DMG
  • Circlet: Crit DMG or Crit Rate

Substats

  1. Crit DMG
  2. Crit Rate
  3. ATK%
  4. Energy Recharge
  5. Elemental Mastery

Pyro Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

Same as Electro, it's better to build Manekin with a full Elemental Mastery build to maximize the DMG of their Burgeon. On the other hand, you can also build Pyro Manekin on a full DPS build and depend on their Elemental Burst to deal a one-time high Melt DMG. Not really game-changing, but it's cool.

Weapons

  1. Light of Foliar Incision
  2. Freedom-Sworn
  3. Xiphos' Moonlight
  4. Sapwood Blade
  5. Iron Sting

  • 4pc Gilded Dreams

  • Goblet: Elemental Mastery
  • Circlet: Elemental Mastery or Crit Rate
